HomePage.title: The Digital Garden
HomePage.subtitle: Computational Essays on Physics, Medicine, and Complexity.

Metadata.logisticMapDescription: Interactive simulation of the logistic map, a classic example of deterministic chaos.

LogisticMap.title: Logistic Map: Deterministic Chaos
LogisticMap.description: This is a recurrence map for the logistic equation xn+1 = r * xn * (1 - xn).
LogisticMap.cobwebDesc: The trajectory (or orbit) of the value x over the iterations.
LogisticMap.adjustmentHint: Adjust the r parameter to observe different behaviors. Values around 3.57 mark the beginning of chaotic behavior.
